subject: HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
body:
HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
Address: 28 Borough High St,
London SE1 1YB, United Kingdom
Phone: +44 345 740 4404
Hello.?
I am Dr Andrew Makinson. The Managing Director of HSBC bank of London
UK and i am contacting you regarding to the  insertion we received
from the World Bank  to release your funds sum 10.5 Million 
United
State Dollars
 to you through ATM Visa Card  immediately
So 
you are advice to resend your information below to  receive your
ATM Visa Card from our agent to your doorstep  immediately
FULL NAMES: _______________
CITY: ________________
STATE: ______________
ZIP: __________
COUNTRY_______________
AGE: _____
TELEPHONE NUMBER: _________
Waiting for your urgent reply.
We bank in your response.
Yours in service,
Regards,
BEST REGARDS,
Managing Director/HSBC UK
Dr Andrew Makinson

subject: Re: HSBC LONDON UK BANK PLC.
body:
Dear Dr. Andrew Makinson,

I am surprised to receive your email regarding the release of funds through an ATM Visa Card. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about this transaction? How did the World Bank come to select me for this fund release?

Secondly, I would appreciate if you could explain the process in detail. How will the funds be transferred to my ATM Visa Card and what are the security measures in place?

Lastly, I would like to know about any fees or charges associated with this transaction.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kevin
